text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, welcome back, Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?! You're here already?! Ahaha...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wait, those shoes... Are you going for<n>a run?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it's my daily routine.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, is that right? ...Ah.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I wonder if she'd let me run with her<n>again if I asked.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Maybe when she gets back, I'll work<n>up the courage to
ask. Then<n>afterwards... Hee hee!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(That's right. I was thinking of asking<n>her if I could come...
too.)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Although... What if running together is<n>only fun for me?
What if I... just get in<n>her way?)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Special Week? Is something the<n>matter?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, it's nothing! I'm gonna eat<n>some dinner. It's already
dark<n>outside, so be careful! See you later...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hm? Oh no. If I don't leave now...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm, Suzuka? You're going running at<n>this hour?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um... I don't plan on going very far, so<n>if I leave right now, I
should be back in<n>time before curfew...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Of all the—people like you really are<n>trouble. I'm tagging
along.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: You're letting me run?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You were prohibited from running for<n>quite a while, so... it's
not like I don't<n>understand your urge to get back out<n>there.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(The streetlights flicker... and though<n>the days may still be
hot, the breeze at<n>night is so cool...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (It all feels... so good.)

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Phew... Let's take a breather, Suzuka.<n>How's your leg?
Does anything feel<n>off?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'm fine. My injury was only a<n>sprain, after all. I think it was<n>
excessive to have me stop running.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You shouldn't think lightly of injuries<n>you incur while racing.
Even the<n>smallest injury could hurt your racing<n>career.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: That's true, but... it was so hard not<n>being able to run.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I often found myself jealous of the<n>others. I'd lose track of
time just<n>watching them run.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
So all those odd complaints<n>expressed to the student council<n>
about "feeling watched" were<n>because of you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'd also dream of running, and my<n>legs must have been
actually moving<n>while I slept. I would wake up with<n>my
futon and covers all a mess.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You were pretty lucky you had no<n>roommates to witness
your alarming<n>sleeping habits.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I found myself spacing out in class,<n>and when called on by
the teacher, I'd<n>stand up and say, "I'm ready to run!"

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: First off, you need to pay attention in<n>class, Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
N-never mind that... The point is, I've<n>been having a hard
time.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That isn't hard to imagine, given your<n>stubborn obsession
with running.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it ironic? I came to this school<n>and started entering
races because I<n>love running. But that's exactly what<n>lead
to my injury.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hm...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Oh... That break was a little too long.<n>We have to get back
before curfew.<n>Let's go, Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Pant... Phew.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Your form was a little sloppy, Suzuka.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I was just... distracted.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What, are you thinking racing doesn't<n>matter so long as you
can still run?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I believe there is a definite reason for<n>you coming here to
Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Is there? What would that—

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That is something you have to<n>answer for yourself... It's
getting cold.<n>Let's head back to the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(I... love running. All alone, I run on<n>and on, always chasing
after that<n>peaceful scenery beyond.)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(But... isn't that something I can find<n>while running on my
own?)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (In that case... why did I come to this<n>school to race?)
